name: American Country Bingo Bash
description:
Super Fun in the United States Country BINGO in your hand. Have fun and relax in the USA Style, just watch out the bingo ball, tap the number, and win the prize! You will enjoy with amazing interactive gameplay, stunning audio and sound effects.

Please ask yourself before playing this BINGO game! How lucky you are? Have you been in Las Vegas before? We bet you will fall in love with this BINGO. The gameplay is designed to give you the exactly the same experience as you’re in the “real” casino in Las Vegas while enjoyable with your Country !!!!

features:
- Simulate the real BINGO game.
- Amazing audio and sound effect.
- Beautiful graphic American style.
